long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lists DART/IrishRail train times. Save your favourite station and keep an eye on your train time with handy icon badge times for the 2 trains closest to your departure time.

Perfect for people who get need to get a specific dart home after work and want to know if it's coming late (or even early!) and when their next option is.
